To update, do we just press "yes" and let it happen, or will that affect a modded 360? Any likelihood of it freezing or bricking the 360?

@ jays...installing the update will re-flash your drive back to stock. You then risk possibly bricking (unlikely), but also can be flagged.. best to flash to stock, update via usb to .13146. software, than re-flash drive with newest lt + firmware..

guys i've got a problem. I downloaded the game burned it and put in the xbox. When it asked me about the update i clicked yes. It started to install and the xbox rebooted. When it started again it showed me a message that the update can't be read from the cd and i should enter the cd again if i want to continue. I did that but it didnt work, i burned the dvd again but it didnt work, i downloaded the update from the xbox website, burned it twice but it didnt work. It may be sth simple but i dont know what to do. HELP
